# Maintainer notes

The distribution contains these files

 * `vmdplumed.tcl`. The main gui. 
 * `templates_list_vmdcv.tcl`. List of templates for the "colvar" builtin interface. Manually generated. Untested
 * `templates_list_v1.tcl`. List of templates for PLUMED 1. Manually generated. Likely obsolete.
 * `templates_list_v2.tcl`. List of templates for PLUMED 2. Autogenerated. 
 * `pkgIndex.tcl` Autogenerated. See note 2.


## Bumping version

Use

    uv tool install bump-my-version
    bump-my-version minor



## Autogenerated files

See also the `maintainer/Makefile`:

    make -f maintainer/Makefile  # note: not -C

### List of templates for PLUMED 2

This is generated by the `maintainer/templates_list_v2_generator.tcl` generator, which invokes `plumed driver` (which
must be in the path). 

### Package index

It is an important part of TCL's packaging scheme. The file should be updated as part of the bumping process.
